assignments.description: Assigns Skill_Specialzation variable to 'Cancel' skill and Default routing configuration
assignments.name: Assign_Specialization_Skill_Routing_Config
assignments.label: Assign Specialization Skill, Routing Config

assignments.description: Initializing Fault Line details for fault paths in objExceptionLogEvent record.
assignments.name: Initialize_Fault_Path_Details
assignments.label: Initialize Fault Path Details

decisions.description: Checks if the case is eligible for Accountant support check based if persona is 'Accountant'. P5 is assigned on such cases.
decisions.name: Accountant_Support_Check
decisions.label: Accountant Support Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Not Eligible for Accountant Priority Support

decisions.description: Checks if the case is eligible for Benefits support check based if persona is Admin and Request Type = Benefits. Addressed with P8 Priority
decisions.name: Benefits_Support_Check
decisions.label: Benefits Support Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Not Eligible for Benefits Support Check

decisions.description: checks if the case persona is 'Accountant' and Partner Tier on Account is 'Gold/Silver'
decisions.name: Gold_Silver_Support_check
decisions.label: Gold Silver Support check

decisions.description: Checks if the case is eligible for Grower support check based if persona is Admin and Company Size = ("Grower 50", "Grower 25-49"). Addressed with P7 Priority
decisions.name: Grower_Support_Check
decisions.label: Grower Support Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Not Eligible for Accountant Priority Support

decisions.description: If the Chat Transcript originates from a 'Gusto Global' account, then route it to the agent with 'Gusto Global'
decisions.name: Gusto_Global
decisions.label: Gusto Global

decisions.description: If the chat record contains a specialization - either predicted by ORCA or the ORCA Case Reason prediction has a specialization mapped, then the chat is routed only with this skill
decisions.name: Has_Specialization_Prediction
decisions.label: Has Specialization Prediction

decisions.description: Checks if the case is eligible for premium priority support check if the Account's tier is "Premium" and Additional Services on account contains "Priority Support". P4 is assigned on such cases.
decisions.name: Premium_Priority_Support_Check
decisions.label: Premium Priority Support Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: Not Eligible for Premium Priority Support

decisions.description: Skill Level on the Type skill is stored on the chat
decisions.name: Skill_Level_Check
decisions.label: Skill Level Check

Flow.description: Routes each chat to an agent with the required skills based on conditions that you define Optimized, Includes a Fault Path. Includes Gusto Global Changes - BTE-2753 BTE-2915 - Included null checks for all the chat parameters BTE-2814 - Waterfall Routing For Chat BTE-2813 - Specialization changes BTE-3348 - Skill Level Changes BTE-3555 - ORCA Specialization bug fix BTE-3555 - Removed Specialization routing from flow BTE-3584 - Default Chat Support Level to Tier 1 BTE-3605 - Default Chat to Payroll if ORCA provides blanks BTE-3725 - Deploy Specialization Chat Routing - 10/31
Flow.interviewLabel: Omni Skills Flow For Engagement Chat {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Omni Skills Flow For Engagement Chat

loops.description: This Loop assigns the skill Id that can be used in the Route Work Action
loops.name: Skills_loop
loops.label: Skills loop

recordCreates.description: Create Exception Log event from fault line details in objExceptionLogEvent
recordCreates.name: Exception_Log_Event
recordCreates.label: Exception Log Event

recordLookups.description: This Action queries for all the chat skills and stores the Id and DeveloperName for further usage
recordLookups.name: Get_Chat_Skills
recordLookups.label: Get Chat Skills

textTemplates.description: Exception Log Message containing flow details in a fault path.
textTemplates.name: strExcptionLogMessage
textTemplates.text: <p>Fault Message: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}</p><p>----</p><p>Interview Guid: {!$Flow.InterviewGuid}</p><p>----</p><p>Current Record: {!$Flow.CurrentRecord}</p><p>----</p><p>You can find failed flow interviews with the link below. The link below is for Production failed interviews, but if you would like to find them in another environment in Setup, simply search for Paused and Failed Flow Interviews in Setups Quick Find bar, and switch to the All Failed Flow Interviews List View. You can use the interview "Interview Guid" above to locate this specific failures.  </p><p>https://gusto.lightning.force.com/lightning/setup/Pausedflows/home</p>

variables.description: The chat transcript record that is being inputted into the flow. Necessary for the flow to run.
variables.name: input_record

variables.description: Conversation Context Entry object(s) that will provide information from Pre-Chat fields.
variables.name: prechatInfo

variables.description: The ID of the record being inputted into the flow. Necessary for the flow to run.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Used to store the applicable routing configuration Id
variables.name: SkillBasedRoutingConfigId

variables.description: Skill Requirement(s) that can be added to the work being routed.
variables.name: SkillRequirements

variables.description: Value of the Subject field in the pre-chat list.
variables.name: SubjectField

variables.description: Variable to store the Company Size from Chat Transcript record to determine the skill, Default Value - Standard 5-24
variables.name: Text_Company_Size

variables.description: Variable to store the persona from the chat transcript object to map the person skill. Default - Admin
variables.name: Text_Persona
